mapper.select: select a.rid as "ID", a.inhosno as "PatientId", a.patient_name as "PatientName", case when a.sex = '1' then '男' when a.sex = '2' then '女' else '1' end as "Sex", a.age as "Age", REGEXP_REPLACE(a.age, '[0-9]', '') as "AgeUnit", '' as "LabItemsList", b.exe_csqn as "TestOrderNo", '4' as "ItemType", '常规检查' as "ItemTypeName", a.sample_type as "ItemCode", c.dict_name as "ItemName", str_to_date(a.sample_reach_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as "SubmitAt", str_to_date(a.get_result_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as "ResultDate", a.dept_id as "DeptId", a.dept_name as "DeptName" from lis_test_reg a, lis_test_reg_his_item_detail b, lis_dictionary_detail c where a.org_code = b.org_code and a.reg_id = b.reg_id and a.patient_type = 'C' and c.type_code = 'LIS_SAMPLE_TYPE' and c.dict_code = a.sample_type and a.org_code = #{orgcode} and a.inhosno = #{inhosno} and a.sample_reach_time >= str_to_date(#{StartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T') and a.sample_reach_time <= str_to_date(#{EndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T')
